Verses: 1 thaganabalibeedaththaiyum Seeththim Maraththaal Undaakkinaan; Adhu Aindhu Muzha Neelamum Aindhu Muzha Agalamum Sadhuravativum Moondru Muzha Uyaramumaanadhu.
2 adhin Naalu Moolaigalilum Adhanodu Egamaayirukkira Adhin Naalu Kombugalaiyum Undaakki, Adhai Vengalath Thagattaal Moodi,

3 andhap Beedaththin Sagala Panimuttugalaagiya Saambal Edukkaththakka Sattigalaiyum, Karandigalaiyum, Kinnigalaiyum, Muldhuradugalaiyum, Neruppuch Sattigalaiyum Undaakkinaan; Adhin Panimuttugalaiyellaam Vengalaththinaal Panninaan.
4 valaippinnalpondra Oru Vengalach Challataiyaiyum Balibeedaththirku Undaakki, Adhai Andhap Beedaththin Sutrukkuk Keezhe Paadhi Uyaraththil Irukkaththakkadhaaga Vaiththu,
5 andha Vengalach Challataiyin Naalu Moolaigalilum Thandugalaip Paaichchugiradharku Naalu Valaiyangalai Vaarppiththu,
6 andhath Thandugalaich Seeththim Maraththaal Panni, Avaigalai Vengalath Thagattaal Moodi,
7 balibeedaththai Avaigalaal Sumakkaththakkadhaaga, Adhin Pakkangalilulla Valaiyangalil Paaichchinaan; Balibeedaththai Ulvelivittup Palagaigalinaal Seydhaan.
8 aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Vaasalil Koottam Koottamaaik Koodina Sthireegalin Tharppanangalaale, Vengalath Thottiyaiyum Adhin Vengalap Paadhaththaiyum Undaakkinaan.
9 piraagaaraththaiyum Undupanninaan. Therke Thendhisaikku Edhiraana Piraagaaraththukkuth Thiriththamelliya Panjunoolaal Neydha Nooru Muzha Neelamaana Thongudhiraigalaich Seydhaan.
10 avaigalin Thoongal Iruvadhu; Avaigalin Vengalap Paadhangal Iruvadhu; Thoongalin Kokkigalum Avaigalin Poongalum Velli.
11 vadapakkaththuth Thongudhiraigal Noorumuzham; Avaigalin Thoongal Iruvadhu; Avaigalin Vengalap Paadhangal Iruvadhu; Thoongalin Kokkigalum Poongalum Velli.
12 merpakkaththuth Thongudhiraigal Aimbadhu Muzham; Avaigalin Thoongal Paththu; Avaigalin Paadhangal Paththu; Thoongalin Kokkigalum Avaigalin Poongalum Velli.
13 sooriyan Udhikkira Thisaiyaagiya Keezhppakkaththuth Thongudhiraigal Aimbadhu Muzham.
14 orupuraththuth Thongudhiraigal Padhinaindhu Muzham; Avaigalin Thoongal Moondru; Avaigalin Paadhangal Moondru.
15 piraagaaravaasalin Orupuraththukkuch Sariyaaga Marupuraththilum Thongudhiraigal Padhinaindhu Muzham; Avaigalin Thoongal Moondru; Avaigalin Paadhangal Moondru.
16 sutruppiraagaaraththuth Thongudhiraigalellaam Melliya Panjunoolaal Neyyappattirundhadhu.
17 thoongalin Paadhangal Vengalam; Thoongalin Kokkigalum Poongalum Velli; Avaigalin Kumizhgalai Moodiya Thagadum Velli; Piraagaaraththin Thoongalellaam Vellippoongal Podappattavaigalumaayirundhadhu.

18 piraagaara Vaasalin Thongudhirai Ilaneela Noolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Seyyappatta Visiththiraththaiyal Velaiyaayirundhadhu; Adhin Neelam Iruvadhu Muzham, Adhin Agalamum Uyaramum Piraagaaraththin Thongudhiraigalukkuch Sariyaai Aindhu Muzham.
19 avaigalin Thoongal Naalu; Avaigalin Vengalap Paadhangal Naalu; Avaigalin Kokkigal Velli; Avaigalin Kumizhgalai Moodiya Thagadum Avaigalin Poongalum Velli.
20 vaasasthalaththukkum Piraagaaraththukkum Sutrilum Irundha Mulaigalellaam Vengalam.
21 moseyin Kattalaippadi Aasaariyanaana Aaronin Kumaaranaagiya Iththaamaarin Kaiyile Leviyarin Oozhiyaththirkendru Ennik Kodukkappatta Saatchiyin Vaasasthalaththup Porulgalin Thogai Idhuve.
22 yoodhaavin Koththiraththil Oorin Maganaagiya Ooriyin Kumaaran Pesaleyel Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththadhai Ellaam Seydhaan.

23 avanodekoodath Thaan Koththiraththu Akisaamaakin Kumaaranaagiya Agoliyaap Siththirak Koththuvelaikkaaranum, Vinodha Velaigalaich Seygira Thozhilaaliyum, Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambara Noolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Melliya Panjunoolaalum Siththirath Thaiyalvelai Seygiravanumaayirundhaan.

24 parisuththa Sthalaththin Velaigal Yaavatrirkum Kaanikkaiyaagak Kodukkappattuch Selavaana Ponnellaam Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkalinpadi Iruvaththonbadhu Thaalandhum Ezhunootru Muppadhu Sekkal Niraiyumaai Irundhadhu.
25 sabaiyil Ennappattavargal Koduththa Velli Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkalinpadi Nooru Thaalandhum, Aayiraththezhunootru Ezhuvaththaindhu Sekkal Niraiyumaai Irundhadhu.

26 ennappattavargalin Thogaiyil Serndha Iruvadhu Vayadhu Mudharkondu Adharku Merpatta Aarulatchaththu Moovaayiraththu Ainnootru Aimbadhu Pergalil Ovvoru Thalaikku Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkalinpadi Araichchekkalaagiya Pekkaa Ennum Vizhukkaatu Serndhadhu.

27 andha Velliyil Nooru Thaalandhu Velliyinaal Parisuththa Sthalaththin Paadhangalum Thiraiyin Paadhangalum Vaarppikkappattadhu; Paadhaththukku Oru Thaalandhu Vizhukkaatu Nooru Paadhangalukku Nooru Thaalandhu Selavaayitru.
28 andha Aayiraththezhunootru Ezhuvaththaindhu Sekkalaal Thoongalukkup Poongalaip Panni, Avaigalin Kumizhgalaith Thagadugalaal Moodi, Avaigalukkup Poongalai Undaakkinaan.
29 kaanikkaiyaagach Seluththappatta Vengalamaanadhu Ezhuvadhu Thaalandhum Irandaayiraththu Naanooru Sekkal Niraiyumaai Irundhadhu.
30 adhinaale Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasal Maraivin Paadhangalaiyum, Vengalap Balibeedaththaiyum, Adhin Vengalach Challataiyaiyum, Balibeedaththin Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum,
31 sutrup Piraagaaraththin Paadhangalaiyum, Piraagaaravaasal Maraivin Paadhangalaiyum, Vaasasthalaththin Sagala Mulaigalaiyum, Sutruppiraagaaraththin Sagala Mulaigalaiyum Panninaan.
